column4: you can trick it by adding a network status monitor to your bar and then right click on it a and change network monitor settings to nm-applet
the two programs get sweet on one another.

right click on your panel and add/remove panel items, I'm onlu assuming you're using lxde

it's a two phase process first add/remove panel items then click add again and scroll down
